snippet.title: Worms W.M.D. - Out Now! (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Worms W.M.D. is out now on Nintendo eShop on Nintendo Switch! Unleash chaotic turn-based mayhem anytime, anywhere with anyone!

Like Worms on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WormsTeam17
Follow Worms on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WormsTeam17
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Follow Team17 on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/team17ltd
Join Team17 on Discord: http://discord.gg/team17

Rocking a high rez, hand-drawn 2D look, over 80+ weapons including classics and new additions, crafting, vehicles and usable buildings, Worms W.M.D really is the best worms experience to date and rightfully takes the crown as the spiritual successor to Worms Armageddon – did we mention it also has HD Rumble and is playable anywhere!

Worms is all about multiplayer and Worms W.M.D on Nintendo Switch fully supports local multiplayer with your friends on one Nintendo Switch or multiple Nintendo Switch consoles wirelessly. You can even take advantage of a variety of different controller options, with up to four players using a mixture of individual Joy-Con controllers or the Pro Controller. For those who want to extend the fun to six-player battles you can just play pass the controller, hot seat style, with as little as just one Joy-Con!

But wait, there’s more – Full online multiplayer support, heaps of single player content including a story mode, challenge missions, training, the Liberation expansion DLC, Forts Mode and bonus content from the All-Stars pack which features guest stars from our friends including Rocket League, Goat Simulator, The Escapists, Yooka-Laylee and more!

We’ve also got something a little special, coming first to Nintendo Switch:
- A new space theme, Wormhole
- Two new Forts – Mushroom and Tree
- Three new hats
- Three new gravestones

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 
bit.ly/SubTeam17
